song.englishname: I Will Hold My Head High

english.segment1: Sometimes the night starts closing in. And I've lost my way home again. I'm running out of places I can turn. Enemies on every side. Not a friend around for miles. That's the time it really starts to hurt
english.segment2: Beat me up and drag me down. I'll never be afraid
english.segment3: I will hold my head high. Lift my hands to the sky. Rise above all who try to bring me down. I will hold my head high
english.segment4: I know you said it'd be okay. Sometimes I question just the same. I wonder if my problems are too small. Then I look back and realize. All your pain and sacrifice. Oh and how you suffered for us all
english.segment5: Beat me up and drag me down. I'll never be afraid
english.segment6: Beat me up and drag me down. And lock me in or keep me out. Whatever they may throw at me. I'll turn into a song for you.
